thread.section_title: Midphase Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Midphase | www.midphase.com
thread.title: Yvon Tardif

author: Yvon Tardif
title: Yvon Tardif
text:
MidPhase was highly recommended to me. I am using Eco Web Hosting with the courses that I am currently taking and find their control panel very well done. It was very easy to setup everything.
MidPhase works well, however I would like to access my cPanel directly and I have not found a way to do this yet. One advantage is that I can use FileZillla without going to MidPhase first to unlock FTP. After only a few weeks and not being that knowledgeable in this area, it is difficult to give a fair rating. It works for me and my Website is on line without needing any assistance. Some assistance may be required later on.
